评论概述: I own several pairs of these……..because they WORK!
评论详情: After my first pair, which I still use after 8 years of use, I now own 4 pair of these pants because they fit me perfectly, have asymmetrical pocket design, and garner more compliments from TSA, construction supervisors, and coworkers than any other clothing. Pockets are invaluable for small tools and organizing. I work in the entertainment industry, travel every other week, and always have at least 2 pair of these pants in my clothing arsenal.
No muy buena calidad

Pretty sure these pants were designed by somebody who hired a handyman to come do some work and he was wearing blakladder, and they thought “I can make the same thing“. Pockets are in all the wrong places, for instance nail bag pockets are square on the front so they catch as you try to climb ladders or scaffold, bounce off your thigh when you walk. If you have something like for instance a phone, in the pockets on the side when you kneel they bind. These might be useful for painting at best. Just spend the money and buy the blakladder.

评论概述: These work pants are very durable!
评论详情: My son does construction, welding, plumbing, electrical, logging, and many other jobs that are extremely physical.  These are the only work pants he will wear. They hold many tools, and do not get burn holes from the welder. The knee pad inserts we bought separately provide a nice cushion. He has never torn them or split the inseam and gets them very dirty while he's working. They hold up very nicely when washed in warm water and are hung to dry. After they're dry, they're put in a low heat dryer with a dryer sheet for softness and to avoid wrinkles. They keep their durability wash after wash. They are affordable, less expensive than some others and have more work wear features than most. He has worn many other brands over the years and these are definitely his favorite work wear pants. The shipping is fast and customer service is available to assist with any questions.
Worth every penny.  Wear them daily for work.

The design and layout of the pants is fantastic. Plenty of pockets and storage in all the right places. I especially love the front flap pockets for extra nuts/bolts/hardware. I do not like how they did not last long. The seams at the sides And rear started coming apart after only two months. It looks like good materials but not put together well, not seen strong enough.
Way to small. Very cheaply made. I just threw them away.

评论概述: Good with a couple minor flaws in design
评论详情: Great heavy duty pants, but whoever designed them never really worked with the pants as they were intended. First, the pockets on the side of the legs are worthless, those are for looks in casual pants, not work pants. Have you ever put anything in them and tried to walk or bend down? You'll quickly find they are a joke. Velcro has no place on work pants. It takes too much effort to get a pocket open. Flaps for that matter are worthless. You need pockets you can get into easily, no flaps, snaps for velcro. If you feel you need a secure pocket in work pants, which I'm against, then a large easy to open zipper is the way to go.It The open pockets and front bags are fantastic, you're on the right track there. The knees and hems are also genius, they'll wear well and not ravel out. Overall the pants are really good, just mind the small details that can annoy the heck out of you when working.

评论概述: those are not match for Levis sizes
评论详情: work

The length is great but definitely purchase one size up in the waist. Id prefer if the pouches for the removable knee pads were oriented with the opening facing up, but it does function. Very sturdy belt loops.
Muy satisfechos con el producto
I liked everything about them

When I saw these pants, I loved the idea of the front pockets. When I received them they were exactly as expected. Very sturdy and extremely comfortable and very useful. There is plenty of storage in these pants! Pockets for everything. The knee area has a piece of extra fabric as reinforcement and I noticed that you can actually insert a piece of foam or maybe they even make a knee pad insert. I add a square piece of high-density foam when I need to be on my knees. There are these hook and loop areas around the belt area that I am still trying to figure out what they are for but I am sure there is a reason for them. I am very happy with them and the company too. I contacted them with a concern and everything was handled extremely fast. Good job!!  Thank you.
My husband has several pairs of this style of pants. These are by far the most durable and well made. The  color is nice and they fit perfectly. Highly recommend!

评论概述: wish i had these years ago
评论详情: GOOD value to cool realy helps me out I can carry can of wd40 in one pocket and a rag and wrenches in the other pocket I like the knee's and the pants cuff reinforcement  plus they look cool and the out side pocket tucks in nicely if you dont need it I ordered 2 more pair  very good choice glad i did and will be putting these to the test  very happy
Pants were way to tight around the crotch area.
Well built pants. Great value. The pockets are super handy and they look really nice with the pockets and knee protectors

评论概述: The review i wish i had read first!
评论详情: These pants look good and the material is decent only on the main part so far with the outside pockets and knee pad pockets being thin but if you have a waist under a US 44 then look elsewhere. The manufacturer clearly uses a single pant pattern for ALL SIZES and just makes the waist smaller so you end up with what looks like MC Hammer would have worn to the jobsite! The phone pocket ends up so low down it is behind the knee which stops you from being able to bend your right leg! I ordered a size up as instructed and the button barely buttons up! If I wore one more size up it would look like I am wearing the bottom half of a burka for siamese twins!

评论概述: My husband loves these pants for work. I ended up buying five pairs!
评论详情: Heavy duty work pants. Husband loves them!

Husband absolutely LOVES these pants.  It says they run small so I ordered up a size in waist.  They were to big.  I ordered normal size and they fir great.  He loves all the pockets and the material is definitely heavy duty but not hot to wear in the heat.  34x34 worked great.
Good pants belt loops are too big for my suspenders

评论概述: Very work worthy I am an electrician by trade
评论详情: Durable and comfy just have to break them in before you wear them to work One day to break in then wash

Pants are small. I wear 36x32. My first pair was 36 and did not fit. Second pair were 38s and fit perfect. I really like these pants and they seem well made and sturdy.If I had had these 30 years ago maybe my knees would not be so bad. But, I like the minor style difference of the brown pants better They just apparently don't come in 38. Will be ordering more  _-------- Edit Pants are still great Instead of returning my too small pair I just ordered some waist extensions tabs Then I just decided to lose weight No kidding,, these pants were the catalyst to me losing about 30 pounds Now they're a little loose.  I've decided to make these the uniform pants for my pest control company.  But unfortunately I need brown and they're out of stock Hopefully they will get more

评论概述: High quality work pants. Run small in waist size.
评论详情: High quality materials; well constructed work pants. Definitely run tight in the waist, so order up on size. They were also clearly designed first for durability and function, so you should know that they aren’t going to be made of cuddly soft fabric. The pockets and holders are also well designed, and so numerous that you’re pretty unlikely to use them all. If anything, there are so many pockets that you run some risk of forgetting where you put stuff. The front flap pockets in front can be easily and comfortably tucked into the traditional front hip pockets when not in use.  As an added bonus, while fashion was definitely not the point of this purchase, my wife even says they’re good looking.
I like the pants overall. I just wish the pockets on the waist line were removable.

评论概述: Worst work pants I’ve ever had!!!
评论详情: I’ve always worn Blakladder work pants but since they can be a little expensive I thought I would give these a try. They are quite possibly the worst pair of work pants I’ve ever bought. The stitching on the utility pockets began to come apart after two days on one pocket and after a week on the other. The knee pad on the left leg is twisted towards the inside of my leg which is incredibly annoying when walking and when I kneel down I have to adjust it every time. And to top it all off a hole has started on the right knee and I’ve only had for just over a month. I’ve bought better pants for less at Walmart. I’ve worn this type of work pants for years and this is by far the worst. Do yourself a favor and don’t cheap out, buy Blakladder or Carhartt.
Fits perfectly, very useful yet stylish, the only downside is the knee area(rough).
Comfortable my husband said. Better quality and last longer than expensive ones from whistle work wear.

评论详情: Really an awesome price for the money what a great deal on these pains are definitely worth
nice work pants fit a little tight around the hips but not too uncomfortable i wear them often and they hold up well for wear and tear

评论概述: Need to make larger sizes as well
评论详情: If Kolossus made these in a 40 waist I would absolutely love them

These utility pants are heavy duty, durable, and have more pockets than a jester. They can either be work pants or tactical range pants. They really are cool.  There is one major flaw: the size runs small. I got a pair of 511 tactical pants in size 36 and I need a belt to keep them up. I got size 36 in this and it's so tight it feels like my circulation is cut off. If I had it to do over again, I'd get 1 size larger.

I normally wear a 33/34 - 30.  Many mentioned these ran a size too small so I figured the 36x32 would be just fine. I was very wrong and this is one reason I do not purchase pants online.  These were a good 4" small in the waist, way more than one size. I have no idea if these were mislabeled or what. If I knew, instead of returning I would replace with the 38" waist. In checking the leg length it appears these were actually mislabeled. The legs are definitely 36" and the waist is more of a 30/32.  Over the past few years I've noticed men's pants can vary greatly in waist size. I've purchased the same brand and size at the same time, and one will fit perfectly while the other is generally much smaller.  If I can get the correct size I'll revise my review and rating because I do like the overall look of these pants.

评论概述: Great for light construction work around the house
评论详情: Got this for my friend’s husband who was working on his honey do list around the house during quarantine, was told it’s sturdy and the pockets were very convenient.  I’m staying at my friends house during the covid 19 outbreak because of issues with my apartment. Between the craziness at the supermarket and worry about availability of certain summer vegetables, she decided to expand the vegetable garden in her backyard. My contribution to the household was getting useful tools and work gear to help achieve the goal, her husband did all the work.  The fit was better than expected, I thought it would run a tad short since the length I got was 2” shorter than the pants size I was told, but the fit was perfect.  The material is thick and sturdy. The pockets were very useful for storing screws, nails, etc. while constructing garden trellises and a storage shed. It’s been a week since the project started. The shed has been completed, but the vegetable garden was only half finished. No issues with these work pants after the first week.

I liked the style and functionality of these pants design. I got this for my husband and he was certain that these were not 36 waist. Surely, he tried them on and they ran small. The construction and pockets all seem like they were constructed well, however I must order a 38 waist now to have my husband test the duration of these pants.

These are great pants with TONS of pockets to hold anything and EVERYTHING. They fit well and have a nice little bit of stretch to the fabric so moving, bending, etc is comfortable and unrestricted. The seams seem well stitched and the material feels very durable. Great pants
I wear them at work they might be too hot to wear in summer
So far so good ,fit is right on and comfortable
Need to be a size 40x30
I’ve had these pants for about 2 weeks, and the pockets are already ripping.
